short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Extension to allow Warwick students to download any Echo 360 Lecture

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download any lectures from Echo 360 Lecture Capture in 3 easy steps:

1) Click on the lecture you want to download
2) Open up the chrome extension
3) Press download 

and you're done!

FAQ
1) My lecture isn't downloading, what can I do?
    -Refresh the page and this should fix your issue.
